Oil is an Artisan Good and common cooking ingredient made from the Oil Maker. It can also be obtained from Pierre's General Store for 200g.Oil is given no quality rating, so its sell price gets no boost from that direction. In addition, despite being considered an Artisan Good, its sell price does not benefit from the Artisan Profession either. Generating little in the way of profit, its main benefit lies in its use as a cooking ingredient.
Rice is a cooking ingredient that can be used in a variety of recipes. It can be purchased for 200g at Pierre's General Store and for 250g at JojaMart.

Sugar is a cooking ingredient that can be used in a variety of recipes. It can be purchased from Pierre's General Store for 100g or from JojaMart for 125g year round.Players have the ability to craft Sugar from Beets by using a Mill. Once placed in the mill one Beet will make three Sugar. Beets placed inside will appear as Sugar in the box beside the Mill the next morning.
Vinegar is a cooking ingredient that can be used in a variety of recipes. It can be purchased for 200g at Pierre's General Store.

Wheat Flour is a cooking ingredient that can be consumed by itself. It can be purchased from Pierre's General Store for 100g or from JojaMart for 125g year round.Players have the ability to craft wheat flour from wheat by using a Mill. Once placed in the mill one wheat will make one wheat flour. Wheat placed inside will appear in the box beside the Mill the next morning.

An Earth Crystal is a type of Mineral. It can be foraged in The Mines, or obtained from Geodes in the Mines (floors 1 - 39), dropped from Duggies in the Mines (floors 1 - 29), or from panning.  It can also be found in Fishing Treasure Chests.Tip:  There is often one on the ground on floor 9 of the mine.Earth Crystals can be destroyed by bombs.

Fire Quartz is a Mineral. It can be foraged in the Mines (floors 80+) or found inside a Magma Geode or Omni Geode.  It can also be found by panning or inside Fishing Treasure Chests. It may occasionally be found in a Garbage Can after the player reaches level 81 of the mines.Fire Quartz can be destroyed by bombs.

The Frozen Tear is a Mineral. It can be foraged in the Mines (floors 40 - 79), or dropped by Dust Sprites (2% drop rate).  It can also be found by panning, inside Frozen Geodes, or in Fishing Treasure Chests.  It may occasionally be found in a Garbage Can after the player reaches level 40 of the mines.It can be destroyed by bombs.

Quartz is a Mineral. It can be found by foraging in The Mines. It can also be found from panning and occasionally in Garbage Cans.Quartz can be destroyed by bombs. Quartz can be used along with 1 coal in a furnace to produce Refined Quartz, taking 1.5 in-game hours to smelt.

Amethyst is a Mineral that can be obtained from Amethyst Nodes and Gem Nodes in the Mines, panning, or dropped from Slimes.  It may also occasionally be found in Fishing Treasure Chests or in a Garbage Can.

Aquamarine is a Mineral. It can be obtained from Aquamarine Nodes and Gem Nodes in the Mines (floors 40+), from panning, and from Fishing Treasure Chests.  It may occasionally be found in a Garbage Can after the player has reached level 41 of the mines.

The Diamond is a Mineral that can be obtained from Diamond Nodes and Gem Nodes in the Mines on floors 50+.  A diamond may also be dropped by a Duggy in the Mines (floors 1-29), a Grub (floors 6-29), and possibly other Monsters at other levels.  Diamonds may also be found in Fishing Treasure Chests, by panning, or found in Garbage Cans after the player has reached level 40 of the mines.A book in the Museum, titled A Study on Diamond Yields, contains the following information:

The Emerald is a Mineral. It can be obtained from Emerald Nodes and Gem Nodes in the Mines (floors 80+), from panning, or in Fishing Treasure Chests.  It may occasionally be found in a Garbage Can after the player has reached level 81 of the mines.  It can also be received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star.

Jade is a Mineral that can be found in Jade Nodes and Gem Nodes in the Mines (floors 40+), by panning, dropped by Blue and Black Slimes in the Slime Hutch, in Fishing Treasure Chests, or received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star.  Jade may also occasionally be found in a Garbage Can after the player has reached level 41 of the mines.

The Prismatic Shard is a Mineral. It is one of the rarest items in the game. It can be obtained from Omni Geodes, Iridium Nodes, Mystic Stones, Gem Nodes and Fishing Treasure Chests. It is also a rare drop from Serpents, Mummies, Shadow Brutes, Shadow Shamans, and Wilderness Golems. Prismatic Shards cannot be duplicated in a Crystalarium.A Prismatic Shard can be used in The Desert to obtain the Galaxy Sword. A bug exists where multiple Prismatic Shards will be removed from the inventory if they are all in the same stack.A Prismatic Shard can also be offered to the Dark Shrine at the Witch's Hut, in order to turn children into doves (getting rid of them permanently).

The Ruby is a Mineral that can be found in Ruby Nodes and Gem Nodes in the Mines (floors 80+), by panning, in Fishing Treasure Chests, or received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star.  It may also occasionally be found in a Garbage Can after the player has reached level 81 of the mines.
Topaz is a type of Mineral that can be obtained from Topaz Nodes and Gem Nodes in The Mines, from panning, or found in Fishing Treasure Chests.  It may occasionally be found in a Garbage Can.
Aerinite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.
Alamite is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.
Baryte is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.
Basalt is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.
Bixite is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.  It can also be dropped by Black Slimes.
Calcite is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.
Celestine is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.
Dolomite is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.
Esperite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.
Fairy Stone is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.
Fire Opal is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.
Fluorapatite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.
Geminite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.
Ghost Crystal is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.
Granite is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.
Helvite is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.
Hematite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.
Jagoite is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.
Jamborite is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.
Jasper is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.
Kyanite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.
Lemon Stone is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.
Limestone is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.
Lunarite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.
Malachite is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.
Marble is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.
Mudstone is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.
Nekoite is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.
Neptunite is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.  It can also be dropped by Black Slimes.
Obsidian is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.
Ocean Stone is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.
Opal is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.
Orpiment is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.
Petrified Slime is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.  It may also be found inside Slime Balls produced in a Slime Hutch.
Pyrite is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.
Sandstone is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.
Slate is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.
Soapstone is a mineral that can be found in the Frozen Geode and the Omni Geode.
Star Shards are a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.
Thunder Egg is a mineral that can be found in the Geode and the Omni Geode.
Tigerseye is a mineral that can be found in the Magma Geode and the Omni Geode.

The Frozen Geode is a Mineral deposit that contains minerals, artifacts, ores, or basic resources. It can be found on levels 41 to 79 of The Mines, on the farm in the Winter, or inside a Fishing Treasure Chest.  It can also be received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star.

The Geode is a Mineral deposit that contains minerals, artifacts, ores, or basic resources.  It can be obtained from breaking rocks around the map and in The Mines (floors 1 - 39), or dropped by Duggies.  It may also be found in Fishing Treasure Chests or received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star.

The Magma Geode is a Mineral deposit that contains minerals, artifacts, ores, or basic resources. It can be found on levels 81 to 119 of The Mines or in Fishing Treasure Chests.  It can also be received as a gift at the Feast of the Winter Star.

The Omni Geode is a Mineral deposit found primarily by breaking rocks in The Mines.  It must be broken open at the Blacksmith to obtain the items inside.  Omni Geodes can contain minerals, artifacts, ores, or basic resources.  Omni Geodes can be found while panning, on all levels of The Mines, and on all levels of the Skull Cavern.  They can also be purchased from the Oasis on Wednesdays for 1,000g, and from Krobus on Tuesdays for 300g.  Five Omni Geodes are the reward for completing the  Geologist's Bundle in the Boiler Room.Neither daily luck nor luck buffs affect the contents of an Omni Geode.  Since the contents are randomly determined, restarting the game may change which items are inside.  The contents are determined when the Omni Geode is processed at the Blacksmith.
A Bat Wing is a type of Monster Loot in Stardew Valley. It is dropped by Bats. It can also be purchased for 30g from Krobus on Sundays. Bat Wings can be used to make Lightning Rods.
Bug Meat is a Monster Loot item which is dropped from Bug, Cave Fly, and Grub. It can be used to make bait or Wild Bait.
SlimeA shimmering, gelatinous glob with no smellInformationSource:Slimes \u2022 Krobus \u2022 Slime BallSell Price:5g

Slimes produce Slime Balls, and do so only when given access to water via the troughs in the Slime Hutch. There must be either one male and one female slime or at least five slimes of one sex present before Slime Balls can be produced. The Slime Ball can be right-clicked to release multiple  Slime items. These piles of slime have a chance of appearing daily, much like the products of coop animals.Slime balls also have a rare chance to have Petrified Slime inside.

Slime eggs can be obtained as rare drops from slimes in the Slime Hutch or by putting 100 slime into a Slime Egg-Press. They can be hatched into slimes at a Slime Incubator. Since the drop rate of Slime Eggs is quite low, it is recommended to produce them via the Egg-Press if you want a colorful horde without spending hours and hours in The Mines. They can be sold at different prices depending on the rarity.There are four different egg types that will hatch a slime of the respective color: green, blue, red and purple. Green eggs are by far the most common ones, and purple the rarest. The gender of the egg is completely random and can't be found out before hatching the egg.
Solar Essence is a Monster Loot item which is dropped from the Ghost, Metal Head, Squid Kid and Mummy. Krobus also sells 10 a day for80g each.
Void Essence is a Monster Loot item which can drop from the Shadow Brutes, Shadow Shamans, and Serpents. Krobus sells 10 a day for100g.

Clay is a resource that can be found by digging up dirt (1  Clay), sand (1  Clay), or Artifact Spots (1-3 Clay), and from cracking open Geodes (usually 1 Clay).  It can also be received as a gift from Jas or Vincent at the Feast of the Winter Star.

Coal is a basic resource. It can be obtained in many different ways, primarily from rocks or Dust Sprites in The Mines, purchased from Clint at the Blacksmith shop, or using a Charcoal Kiln.  It may also be produced by recycling trash or found in Fishing Treasure Chests.  Coal is used in some crafting recipes and is necessary for smelting ore or Quartz in a furnace.

A Copper Bar is created by smelting 5 Copper Ore in a furnace with 1 coal for fuel. Smelting the copper in a furnace takes 30 in-game minutes. Copper bars are used in a variety of crafting recipes and are used to upgrade tools. They can be sold for 60g.
Copper Ore is obtained from copper nodes with a pickaxe. Mining a copper node will yield between 1 and 3 copper ore. The Miner Profession can further increase this.
Fiber is a resource. It is obtained by cutting weeds with a scythe or weapon.  Weeds that drop Fiber can be found in high quantities often on Floors 25 and 105 of the Mines.

A Gold Bar is created by smelting 5 Gold Ore in a furnace with 1 coal for fuel, or by transmuting 2 Iron Bars into one Gold Bar. Smelting Gold Ore in a furnace takes 5 in-game hours.  The Transmute (Au) recipe is earned at Mining Level 7. A Gold Bar can be found (rarely) in the Garbage Can next to the Blacksmith.  Five Gold Bars are the reward for completing the  Enchanter's Bundle on the Bulletin Board.  If Clint is your secret gift-giver at the Feast of the Winter Star, he may give you 5 Gold Bars.Gold bars are used in a variety of crafting recipes and are used to upgrade tools to tier 4. One Gold Bar can be sold for 250g.

Gold Ore is a resource that can be placed in a furnace, along with coal, to create a Gold Bar. Each bar requires 5 gold ore and one coal to create, taking about five in-game hours. Gold ore can be mined from gold nodes in the Mines at levels 80+ and has a chance to spawn in the Quarry. Gold ore is also a rare drop by ghosts and skeletons before level 80. Other random sources of gold ore are fishing treasure chests and beachfront Artifact Spots. Gold ore can be sold for 25g each. You can also get gold ore for 400g each from Clint, totaling 2,000g per bar.

Hardwood is a resource. It is obtained by chopping a Large Stump with a Copper Axe or better, or a Large Log with a Steel Axe or better.Six (6) Large Stumps respawn daily in the Secret Woods, making it possible to obtain 12 Hardwood per day. If you have the Forest Farm map there are eight (8) more stumps at the left side of your farm making for an additional 16 Hardwood that respawns daily.  It can also be received as loot by breaking barrels and boxes in the Mines. Normal trees have a chance of dropping Hardwood with the Lumberjack Profession.  Robin may also gift you 25 Hardwood at the Feast of the Winter Star.

An Iridium Bar is crafted by smelting 5  Iridium Ore and 1  Coal in a Furnace. Purple Slimes in the Skull Cavern or Slime Hutch also have a chance to drop Iridium Bars and Ore.  The Travelling Cart may sell an Iridium Bar for 3,000-5,000g.  One Iridium Bar can also be received as a gift from Clint at the Feast of the Winter Star.  An Iridium Bar can be shipped or sold to Clint at the Blacksmith Shop for 1,000g.In real life, iridium is a silver, brittle metal that can be hazardous in a fine dust and has toxic radioactive isotopes.

Iridium Ore is a resource found in Iridium Nodes, rare Iridium deposits, Magma Geodes, and Omni Geodes.  It is also a rare drop from high level Monsters, and can be found in Fishing Treasure Chests.  The Statue of Perfection produces 2-8 Iridium Ore per day.

An Iron Bar is created by smelting 5 Iron Ore in a furnace with 1 coal for fuel, or by Crafting the Transmute (Fe) recipe (3 Copper Bars into one Iron Bar).  Iron Bars may also occasionally be found in Garbage Cans after receiving the Furnace blueprints from Clint.Smelting iron ore in a furnace takes 2 in-game hours.  The Transmute (Fe) recipe is earned at Mining Level 4.Iron bars are used in a variety of crafting recipes and are used to upgrade tools to tier 3. Each iron bar can be sold for 120g.

Iron Ore is obtained by mining iron nodes with a pickaxe or from Fishing Treasure Chests. Iron ore can also be purchased from the Blacksmith for 150g.  It may be dropped by Metal Heads or Stone Golems in The Mines as well.Mining an iron node will yield between 1 and 3 iron ore. These nodes become common around level 40-50 in the Mines. It's fairly easy to farm Iron Ore and coal by killing Dust Sprites there.Iron ore can be smelted in a Furnace to create an Iron Bar. The smelting requires 5 iron ore and 1 coal to begin and takes 2 hours to complete.

Refined Quartz is created by smelting 1 Quartz in a furnace with 1 coal for fuel. It can be sold for 50g. Until obtaining the Crystalarium it is a lot faster and easier to obtain Refined Quartz via the Recycling Machine than from Quartz itself.

Stone is a basic resource obtained by mining rocks with a pickaxe.  Stone can also be purchased from Robin at the Carpenter's Shop for 20g each, or found in Fishing Treasure Chests.  Fifty stone can also be received as a gift from Robin at the Feast of the Winter Star.Normal rocks yield between 1 and 3 stones. Boulders yield 10 stones. Stone is used in various crafting recipes and is also required as a form of payment when purchasing certain buildings and building upgrades at the Carpenter's Shop.

Wood is a basic resource that can be obtained by felling trees and branches with an axe or bought from Robin at the Carpenter's Shop for 10g. It can also be found in Fishing Treasure Chests.  Ninety-nine wood can also be received as a gift from Robin at the Feast of the Winter Star.Felling a normal-sized tree will give you between 13 and 17 wood, depending on daily Luck. After felling the tree, you can also destroy the stump which will give you between 5 and 7 wood. Be careful, as felling trees near water can result in the loss of some, or all of the wood. Contrary to popular belief, stumps will never grow back (a fact confirmed directly by ConcernedApe).

The Bouquet is sold at the Pierre's General Store for 200g and can be given to one of the 12 marriage candidates once you have reached 8 Hearts with any one of them. It won't be available for sale until 8 heart friendship has been gained with a villager.The bouquet can be given to multiple marriage candidates regardless if you have already given one to another.After a bouquet has been given to a marriage candidate instead of saying (single) under their name it says (girlfriend) or (boyfriend), unless you are already engaged.
The Club Card is obtained from Mr. Qi after completing The Mysterious Qi Quest.The item can be found in your Wallet in the The Player's Menu on the Skills tab.It is used to enter the Casino.

The Dark Talisman can be found in a chest in the Mutant Bug Lair.  Obtaining it is part of the Dark Talisman quest.After obtaining it, it can be found in your Wallet in the The Player's Menu on the Skills tab.  Oddly enough, it remains in your wallet even after using it.  It is used to open the passage at the northeast end of the Railroad.

The Dwarvish Translation Guide is a special item unlocked by donating all 4 Dwarf Scrolls to the Museum.The item can be found in your wallet in the The Player's Menu on the Skills tab.It is used to unlock the ability to speak to the Dwarf merchant in The Mines.

The golden pumpkin is a valuable object obtained during the Spirit's Eve Festival, it has no other purpose than selling it for a profit of 2500.  To obtain the Golden Pumpkin, head north after arriving at the event. Make your way through the maze until you reach a sign that contains a question mark. Proceed through the bushes adjacent (left) the sign and again move north into a cave. Continue east and then south until you reach the treasure chest with the Golden Pumpkin.

Magic Ink can be found on a table in the Witch's Hut after completing the quest Goblin Problem.  It can be returned to the Wizard in exchange for his gratitude.  Returning the Ink also unlocks several new Farm Buildings that can be purchased from a book on a stand in the Wizard's Tower.The item can be found in your Wallet in the The Player's Menu on the Skills tab.  Oddly enough, it remains in your wallet after returning it to the Wizard.

The Mermaid's Pendant is an item obtained from the Old Mariner for 5,000g after you have reached 10 hearts with a romanceable villager, given them a bouquet, and have the first farmhouse upgrade. This pendant is used to marry a character. The Old Mariner will be at the beach past the bridge that costs 300 wood to build. He will only appear on rainy days, so he never appears in the winter.If you are married, the Old Mariner will appear, but will not sell you a Mermaid's Pendant.  If you get divorced, you can purchase another one, which can be given to any romanceable villager.

The Rusty Key is obtained from Gunther in a cutscene after donating 60 items to the Museum. Its existence is first referenced by Jas and Vincent in a cutscene.The item can be found in your Wallet in the The Player's Menu on the Skills tab.It is used to enter The Sewers.

The Skull Key is obtained on level 120 of The Mines. Upon obtaining it, you can unlock the door in the Skull Cavern and play Junimo Kart in The Stardrop Saloon.You can find the Skull Key in your 'Wallet' in the The Player's Menu in the Skills tab.

The Special Charm is an item that greatly increases the chance for daily Luck.  It is unobtainable as of PC v1.11.  It is the item that would appear in the blank space in the player's Wallet between the Club Card and the Skull Key.

A heater has an effect on animal Mood (which is different than Friendship) during the Winter when an animal is inside a barn or coop past 6PM, and the animal has 150 mood or above. Only a single heater is required to have an effect, additional heaters provide no additional benefit.If the animal is able to enter a building with a heater without being trapped outside, they will gain 10 mood every 10 in-game minutes past 6PM, up to the maximum value of 255, or until the Farmer goes to sleep.

To use the incubator, place an egg into it by right-clicking.  You cannot remove an egg once placed in an incubator.Dinosaur Eggs take  18,000m (12.5d) to incubate.  Chicken Eggs (including Large Eggs and Void Eggs) and Duck Eggs take  9000m (6.25d) to incubate.  This time is cut in half with the Coopmaster Profession.
Using the milk pail on an animal other than a cow or goat will produce the message [Animal name] doesn't produce milk.
As of v1.11 on the Riverlands and Forest Farm Maps, some bushes can be destroyed with an upgraded axe.
As of v1.11 on the Riverlands and Forest Farm Maps, some bushes can be destroyed with an upgraded axe.
As of v1.11 on the Riverlands and Forest Farm Maps, some bushes can be destroyed with an upgraded axe.
As of v1.11 on the Riverlands and Forest Farm Maps, some bushes can be destroyed with an upgraded axe.

It is used mainly for breaking stones and picking up placed equipment or furniture items (such as floors and sprinklers).  It is also used to un-till soil that has been tilled with a Hoe.With each upgrade level, the number of hits required to break stones is reduced and bigger stones may become breakable.Using a pickaxe on a Monster will deal a small portion of damage, similar to other weapons.

It is used mainly for breaking stones and picking up placed equipment or furniture items (such as floors and sprinklers).  It is also used to un-till soil that has been tilled with a Hoe.With each upgrade level, the number of hits required to break stones is reduced and bigger stones may become breakable.Using a pickaxe on a Monster will deal a small portion of damage, similar to other weapons.

It is used mainly for breaking stones and picking up placed equipment or furniture items (such as floors and sprinklers).  It is also used to un-till soil that has been tilled with a Hoe.With each upgrade level, the number of hits required to break stones is reduced and bigger stones may become breakable.Using a pickaxe on a Monster will deal a small portion of damage, similar to other weapons.

It is used mainly for breaking stones and picking up placed equipment or furniture items (such as floors and sprinklers).  It is also used to un-till soil that has been tilled with a Hoe.With each upgrade level, the number of hits required to break stones is reduced and bigger stones may become breakable.Using the pickaxe on a Monster will deal a small portion of damage, similar to other weapons.

It is used mainly for breaking stones and picking up placed equipment or furniture items (such as floors and sprinklers).  It is also used to un-till soil that has been tilled with a Hoe.With each upgrade level, the number of hits required to break stones is reduced and bigger stones may become breakable.Using a pickaxe on a Monster will deal a small portion of damage, similar to other weapons.

A Broken CD is a type of trash. It can be found in all fishing spots during all seasons, including via Crab Pots, and can also be found in Garbage Cans.Broken CDs are not used in any bundles, recipes, or quests, but they can be recycled into Refined Quartz.
Broken Glasses are a type of trash. They can be found in all fishing spots during all seasons.  They can also be found in Garbage Cans.  They may be recycled into Refined Quartz.
Driftwood is a type of trash. It can be found in all fishing spots during all seasons.  It may be recycled into useful items.

Joja Cola is a type of trash. It can be found in all fishing spots during all seasons and in Garbage Cans. It can also be purchased at JojaMart for 75g or from the Vending Machine in The Stardrop Saloon. It is the only trash item that can be purchased. Along with the Rotten Plant, it cannot be recycled.

The Rotten Plant is a type of trash. It is produced by a Jack-O-Lantern that decomposes on the 1st of Winter (unless it has been stored in inventory or a chest).  It cannot be placed in a Recycling Machine.
The Soggy Newspaper is a type of trash. It can be found in all fishing spots during all seasons. It can also be found in Garbage Cans.  It may be recycled into useful items.
Trash can be found in all fishing spots during all seasons.  It can also be found in Garbage Cans.Trash can be recycled into useful items using a Recycling Machine.
Unlike most weapons, using the Master Slingshot on a villager will decrease your friendship with them.
Unlike most weapons, using the slingshot on a villager will decrease your friendship with them.
Striking a monster with a Dark Sword gives approximately a .08 chance of increasing the player's HP, if it is below max.

After obtaining a Galaxy Sword, players will not be able to use a Prismatic Shard to obtain another.  If it's lost, players must purchase another from Marlon for 50,000g.Obtaining a Galaxy Sword unlocks the Galaxy Hammer and Galaxy Dagger in the Adventurer's Guild shop.
The scythe is used to cut grass, weeds, and bushes, and is also required for harvesting certain crops (e.g., Amaranth, Kale, Wheat).
The name of the hat is a reference to Harvest Moon, as in the original Harvest Moon SNES, the player's character wears a hat of the same style in a darker, or vibrant blue.
This hat bears a striking resemblance to Link's cap from the Legend of Zelda series.

With the Burglar's Ring equipped, Monsters have 2\u00d7 the chance of dropping a loot item (including dropping the same item twice).  The effect doesn't stack if you have two Burglar's Rings equipped.

The Glow Ring may also be found in Fishing Treasure Chests, and is one of the possible gifts your character can receive at the Feast of the Winter Star.The effects of the Glow Ring stack with another Glow Ring, the Small Glow Ring, or the Iridium Band.
The Iridium Band combines the effects of the Glow Ring, Magnet Ring, and Ruby Ring.  Its effects stack with another Iridium Band, a glow ring, a magnet ring, or a ruby ring.
The Magnet Ring increases the radius the player collects items in by two tiles. It stacks with itself, the Small Magnet Ring, and the Iridium Band.

The Ring of Yoba has a chance of giving the  Yoba's Blessing buff after the player takes damage.  The lower the player's health and the higher the daily luck, the higher the chance of receiving the buff.  The Yoba's Blessing buff grants immunity, but only for 5 seconds.
The Savage Ring gives a 2 second  Speed\u00a0(+2) buff after slaying a Monster.
The Slime Charmer Ring prevents the Slime debuff as well as preventing damage from Slimes.
The Small Glow Ring emits light in a radius of 5 tiles around the player.  The effect stacks with the Glow Ring or the Iridium Band.
The Small Magnet Ring increases the collection radius by one tile.  It stacks with another Small Magnet Ring, the Magnet Ring, or the Iridium Band.
The Vampire Ring restores 2 health after slaying a monster.
Warrior Energy is a buff that increases Attack by 10 for 5 seconds.
